name: Help, my spaceship is being hacked by space pirates!
name_original: Help, my spaceship is being hacked by space pirates!
description:
You are a lone spaceship fighting off an attacking group of space pirates. Unfortunately for you, these pirates are more technologically capable than most. Fight off the pirates and survive as long as you can, while losing control of your ships systems to the frequent cyberattacks.

Made for the 2020 GMTK gamejam.
Time was tight, expect bugs and little polish.

Controls:

Hold W to thrust yourself forward

Press A or D to steer

Hold space to shoot

Debug Functions:
Press J, K or L to start a cyberattack.
H starts a random cyberattack.

Credits

Made by Andreas Vallestad and Merel Foekens

Music by Kevin MacLeod

Fonts by Severin Meijer
